item.title: Trump is on a Path to Failure
item.description: The fact that Trump survived bad trajectories before doesn’t mean that this one is destined to reverse.

item.title: In One Colorado Town, People Experiencing Homelessness Can Sleep in Their Car — if They Have a Job
item.description: People experiencing homelessness can sleep in their cars in this wealthy ski town in Colorado, but only if they have a job.
